languages.text: Drukhari weapons ignore penalty from Dual-Weapon Combat

traits.locale_text: Drukhari weapons ignore penalty from Dual-Weapon Combat

languages.text: When Marazhai makes an additional attack granted by {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Dual-Weapon Combat{/g}, using a Drukhari weapon, that attack suffers no penalties and does not have its cost increased.

traits.locale_text: When Marazhai makes an additional attack granted by {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Dual-Weapon Combat{/g} with a Drukhari weapon, that attack suffers no penalties and its cost is not increased.

When Marazhai makes an additional attack granted by {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Dual-Weapon Combat{/g}, using a Drukhari weapon, that attack suffers no penalties and does not have its cost increased.

When Marazhai makes an additional attack granted by {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Dual-Weapon Combat{/g}, using a Drukhari weapon, that attack suffers no penalties and does not have its cost increased.

languages.text: Когда Маражай совершает дополнительную атаку друкарским оружием, применяя талант {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Бой с применением двух видов оружия{/g}, эта атака проходит без штрафов, и ее стоимость не повышается.
languages.original_text: When Marazhai makes an additional attack granted by {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Dual-Weapon Combat{/g} with a Drukhari weapon, that attack suffers no penalties and its cost is not increased.

traits.locale_text: Когда Маражай совершает дополнительную атаку друкарским оружием, применяя талант {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Бой с применением двух видов оружия{/g}, эта атака проходит без штрафов, и ее стоимость не повышается.

Когда Маражай совершает дополнительную атаку друкарским оружием, применяя талант {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Бой с применением двух видов оружия{/g}, эта атака проходит без штрафов, и ее стоимость не повышается.

languages.text: マラハイはデュカーリ武器で{g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}デュアルウェポン・コンバット{/g}追加攻撃すると、その攻撃は追加のコストやペナルティなしで行える。
languages.original_text: When Marazhai makes an additional attack granted by {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Dual-Weapon Combat{/g} with a Drukhari weapon, that attack suffers no penalties and its cost is not increased.

traits.locale_text: マラハイはデュカーリ武器で{g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}デュアルウェポン・コンバット{/g}追加攻撃すると、その攻撃は追加のコストやペナルティなしで行える。

languages.text: Macht Marazhai mit einer Drukhari-Waffe einen zusätzlichen durch {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Zwei-Waffen-Kampf{/g} gewährten Angriff, hat dieser keine Abzüge und keine höheren Kosten.
languages.original_text: When Marazhai makes an additional attack granted by {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Dual-Weapon Combat{/g}, using a Drukhari weapon, that attack suffers no penalties and does not have its cost increased.

traits.locale_text: Macht Marazhai mit einer Drukhari-Waffe einen zusätzlichen durch {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Zwei-Waffen-Kampf{/g} gewährten Angriff, hat dieser keine Abzüge und keine höheren Kosten.

languages.text: Cuando Marazhai lanza un ataque adicional otorgado por {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}combate con dos armas{/g} usando un arma Drukhari, el ataque no sufre penalizaciones ni tiene coste aumentado.
languages.original_text: When Marazhai makes an additional attack granted by {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Dual-Weapon Combat{/g}, using a Drukhari weapon, that attack suffers no penalties and does not have its cost increased.

traits.locale_text: Cuando Marazhai lanza un ataque adicional otorgado por {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}combate con dos armas{/g} usando un arma Drukhari, el ataque no sufre penalizaciones ni tiene coste aumentado.

languages.text: 当玛拉斋装备黑暗灵族武器，施展{g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}双武器战斗{/g}效果赋予的额外攻击时，此次攻击不会受到额外减值影响，也不会额外消耗行动点数。
languages.original_text: When Marazhai makes an additional attack granted by {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Dual-Weapon Combat{/g}, using a Drukhari weapon, that attack suffers no penalties and does not have its cost increased.

traits.locale_text: 当玛拉斋装备黑暗灵族武器，施展{g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}双武器战斗{/g}效果赋予的额外攻击时，此次攻击不会受到额外减值影响，也不会额外消耗行动点数。

languages.text: Lorsque Marazhai porte une attaque supplémentaire conférée par le talent {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Combat à deux armes{/g} avec une arme drukhari, cette attaque n'est pas soumise à une pénalité et son coût n'augmente pas.
languages.original_text: When Marazhai makes an additional attack granted by {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Dual-Weapon Combat{/g}, using a Drukhari weapon, that attack suffers no penalties and does not have its cost increased.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque Marazhai porte une attaque supplémentaire conférée par le talent {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Combat à deux armes{/g} avec une arme drukhari, cette attaque n'est pas soumise à une pénalité et son coût n'augmente pas.

languages.text: Marazhai, Drukhari silahı kullanarak {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Çift Silahlı Çatışma{/g} becerisinin sağladığı bir ilave saldırı yaptığında saldırı, hiçbir ceza puanına maruz kalmaz ve bedeli artmaz.
languages.original_text: When Marazhai makes an additional attack granted by {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Dual-Weapon Combat{/g}, using a Drukhari weapon, that attack suffers no penalties and does not have its cost increased.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai, Drukhari silahı kullanarak {g|f:1b26e486d9974b9ca26d055413fb3e01}Çift Silahlı Çatışma{/g} becerisinin sağladığı bir ilave saldırı yaptığında saldırı, hiçbir ceza puanına maruz kalmaz ve bedeli artmaz.
